name: Pawn can't jump
description:
Pawn can't jump, but dice can ! Destroy has many dice has you can while avoiding the ground.

Standing on a dice face will decrease its number. The dice jump when at zero, if it falls to zero, it will destroy itself and a new one will be created !

The web version doesn't load in all browsers ! It does work on google chrome.

Made using Unity, Audacity and Blender
